title: 000165 alternating green and orange light
message:
Had a 000165 come from another shop, they already USC'd it. Apparently there was liquid damage. The only evidence I see of this is a corroded probe point (TP{1}PPVOUT_SW_LCDBKLT_FB), and some stuff around U7701. Changed U7701, all pads looked good, tested continuity on ones in questions, they were fine. Put new one on and still the charger alternates green then orange at 3 second intervals, no chime, no display, no backlight, no fan.

0V on backlight pins (of course, its not powering on).
O.L on PPHV_S0SW_LCDBKLT (screen connected and disconnected)

I should mention that there was display, chime and fan before changing out the LP8550... Didnt just do it for the fun of it.

Ideas?

title: 000165 alternating green and orange light
message: Inpect closely under microscope, seems to be crap under SMC, first try another IO board and cable......

title: 000165 alternating green and orange light
message: Light will only go green if SMC is reset. Check SMC_RESET and SMC_ONOFF, PPBUS voltage? Disconnect everything from the board.
